Before the end of the transfer window, the record price for Kylian Mbappe is €250 million

Football Andree · 24/08/2023 · Kylian Mbappe

﻿Striker Kylian Mbappe temporarily settles disagreements with PSG to return to play. However, the owners of the Paris team from Qatar still want to transfer him to any team that accepts the price of 250 million euros.
